document.full_text: a federal judge in utah on tuesday temporarily barred a state law to curb illegal immigration from taking effect, saying he wanted to give both sides in a lawsuit more time to prepare their arguments.
document.title: utah immigration law is blocked
lines_and_colors: a federal judge in utah on tuesday temporarily barred a state law to curb illegal immigration from taking effect, saying he wanted to give both sides in a lawsuit more time to prepare their arguments.
